data.description:
Have you ever been in Madeira? Did you ever saw the beauty that this island can offer? Now you got an opportunity to fast travel there, just by putting your headset on. 

Immerse yourself into 360 3D videos of the nicest locations on the island. Let your headset take you there in full 360 3D with spatial audio in max allowed quality.Feel the heights of the cliffs, the beauty of the hills and forests. Relax on a beach, walk along levadas or visit Funchal . 

Listen to a narrative voice over description of each location in English, Chinese, German and Portuguese! 

Currently there are 73 viewpoints from 21 scenes, where you can travel.
In each scene (touristic hot spot) you have usually around 3-7 viewpoints, where you can immerse yourself into the beauty of Madeira. 
But be careful, sometimes the locations are on an edge of a cliff, or on a glass platform. If you look at them in the immersive 360 3D view, you might get a bit dizzy.

In the future, there are still a few viewpoints to add, together with time-lapses.

It might be one of the biggest apps in your headset, but I hope the experience is really worth it. (Currently around 13GB)

Your next holiday is just a point and click away! 

Enjoy it now!

changelog.change_log: Reduced the initial download size to half, rest is downloaded during the app is running.

!!Major update!!!
- Map is now available on every view/scene by pressing the secondary (B) button on the right controller
now the user does not have to travel back to the "Map Location"
- Bug fix which caused an occasional hiccup by transition between scenes is now fixed
- Internal small bug and performance improvements

- Added Chinese Text translations
- Cosmetics adjustments by English texts

Sometimes a line artifact has been seen, gone now.
Loading text is shown, when a new video takes longer to load.

Fixed the Loading Text between scenes and viewpoints
Changed the controllers to match the Quest 3 controllers

* Tropical Gardens from Funchal added with 10 viewpoints
* Controllers are now labelled
* Secondary button on the right controller now takes the user back to map

Added 4 new locations
- Achada Da Cruz
- Praia da Ponta do Sol
- Capelinha de Nossa 
- Cais da Esperanca 

Adjusted some background sound volumes
Music and voice over can be turned off, video sounds are always playing, even when music is turned off
Some text corrections

* added new location Seixal
* increased the sound of videos, as the voice over and music was louder

* an approved release for app lab
* fixed rotational issues
* English, German, Cinese and Portuguese voice overs added
